A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First of all\, I was entertained. That being said\, I was also very disappointed based upon the history of Star Wars and all that has been shown in those movies thus far. They have always made attempts to connect one film to the next. That approach has abruptly ended with The Last Jedi. So many opportunities lost with this film.***Part 2*** 12/19 - I just viewed the film this evening for the 2nd time. i was once again entertained. I also felt that while I won't forgive the sins of the movie\, I won't discredit the attributes of it either. Therefore\, I am adjusting my original rating of 1.5 stars up to 3 stars. Its not a great film\, but not a trainwreck either.
